mapper.select: select count(*) from BOARD where BODIV = '후기'

select * from (select rownum rnum, bonum, pronum, num, boref, bostep, boid, botitle, bocontent, bopw, bodiv, boimg, bodate from (select * from BOARD where BODIV = '후기' order by BOREF desc, BOSTEP asc)) where rnum > #{start} and rnum <= (#{start}+10)
select count(*) from BOARD where BODIV = '후기' and PRONUM = #{proNum}

select * from (select rownum rnum, bonum, pronum, num, boref, bostep, boid, botitle, bocontent, bopw, bodiv, boimg, bodate from (select * from BOARD where BODIV = '후기' and PRONUM = #{proNum} order by BOREF desc, BOSTEP asc)) where rnum > #{start} and rnum <= (#{start}+10)
select count(*) from BOARD where BODIV = '문의'

select * from (select rownum rnum, bonum, pronum, num, boref, bostep, boid, botitle, bocontent, bopw, bodiv, boimg, bodate from (select * from BOARD where BODIV = '문의' order by BOREF desc, BOSTEP asc)) where rnum > #{start} and rnum <= (#{start}+10)
select count(*) from BOARD where BODIV = '문의' and PRONUM = #{proNum}

select * from (select rownum rnum, bonum, pronum, num, boref, bostep, boid, botitle, bocontent, bopw, bodiv, boimg, bodate from (select * from BOARD where BODIV = '문의' and PRONUM = #{proNum} order by BOREF desc, BOSTEP asc)) where rnum > #{start} and rnum <= (#{start}+10)
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD values (BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{proNum}, #{num}, BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{boStep}, #{boId}, #{boTitle}, #{boContent}, #{boPw}, #{boDiv}, #{boImg}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update BOARD set BOTITLE = #{boTitle}, BOCONTENT = #{boContent}, BOIMG = #{boImg} where BONUM = #{boNum}
mapper.delete: delete * from BOARD where BONUM = #{boNum} and BOPW = #{boPw}
